definition: Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: Color weaving to import products, cotton products imported per cent negative growth.
sentences.chinese: 色织布为主要进口产品，纯棉类产品进口同比负增长。

sentences.english: Shenzhen Development Bank's 25 percent growth is the lowest.
sentences.chinese: 净利润同比增长最慢的深发展也保持了25%的增长。

sentences.english: Year-on-year growth was broad-based across sectors and geographies.
sentences.chinese: 大部分行业与地区的黄金需求取得同比增长。

sentences.english: The reduction in Off-course stores continued its slide in 2010.
sentences.chinese: 高尔夫场外零售店数量同比2010年继续减少。

sentences.english: Which country has retail sales headline growth of 13 per cent year-on-year?
sentences.chinese: 哪个国家的总体零售销售同比增长会有13%？

sentences.english: Which defensive duo can be compared to you and Nesta?
sentences.chinese: 哪一中卫组合能与你和内斯塔等同比对？

sentences.english: Hotel net revenue was $52.1 million in the second quarter 2010, up 13 percent (nine percent on a constant currency basis) year over year.
sentences.chinese: 酒店净收入为5210万美元，同比上升了13%。

sentences.english: July, 2011 will be low watermark for year-over-year price trends in housing.
sentences.chinese: 2011年7月将是住房价格同比趋势最低谷的时期。

sentences.english: The noise generated by wheels and rails was decreased by 9 decibels, which is more favorable for night driving.
sentences.chinese: 轮轨噪声同比下降超过9分贝，夜间行驶更安静。

sentences.english: Of this, domestic travellers are expected to contribute 950 billion yuan, an increase of 8 per cent from last year.
sentences.chinese: 当中将有9500亿元来自国内游，同比增长8%。

sentences.english: Its cargo load factor was 68%, down by 7 ppt YoY.
sentences.chinese: 货邮运载率为68%，同比下跌7个百分点。

sentences.english: Domestic tours were expected to total 1.9 billion for the year, up 10 percent.
sentences.chinese: 全年国内游总数预计将达19亿次，同比增长一成。

sentences.english: Airport passenger traffic rose more than 70 percent on-year in the first half of 2010.
sentences.chinese: 2010年上半年，机场客运量同比增长70%以上。

sentences.english: Like-for-like growth of 7% drew a line under two unprecedented years of falling sales.
sentences.chinese: 同比增长7%，终结了连续两年的销售额的空前跌落。

sentences.english: Global gross bookings increased 17 percent (15 percent on a constant currency basis) year over year.
sentences.chinese: 全球预订量同比增长了17%。

sentences.english: The first three months of 2009 had a 60% year-over-year growth rate in online revenue.
sentences.chinese: 2009年头三个月的在线收入同比增长60%。

definition: degree of reduction (in prices, numbers etc)/decline/drop
the corresponding time period (in a different year etc)/concurrent/synchronous
